010package imagingbook.common.color.sets;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013
014/**
015 * {@link ColorEnumeration} defining a set of CSS colors (see http://davidbau.com/colors/)
016 *
017 * @author WB
018 *
019 */
020public enum CssColor implements ColorEnumeration {
021        AliceBlue(0xF0, 0xF8, 0xFF),
022        AntiqueWhite(0xFA, 0xEB, 0xD7),
023        Aqua(0x00, 0xFF, 0xFF),
024        AquaMarine(0x7F, 0xFF, 0xD4),
025        Azure(0xF0, 0xFF, 0xFF),
026        Beige(0xF5, 0xF5, 0xDC),

144        SkyBlue(0x87, 0xCE, 0xEB),
145        SlateBlue(0x6A, 0x5A, 0xCD),
146        SlateGray(0x70, 0x80, 0x90),
147        Snow(0xFF, 0xFA, 0xFA),
148        SpringGreen(0x00, 0xFF, 0x7F),
149        SteelBlue(0x46, 0x82, 0xB4),
150        Tan(0xD2, 0xB4, 0x8C),
151        Teal(0x00, 0x80, 0x80),
152        Thistle(0xD8, 0xBF, 0xD8),
153        Tomato(0xFF, 0x63, 0x47),
154        Turquoise(0x40, 0xE0, 0xD0),
155        Violet(0xEE, 0x82, 0xEE),
156        Wheat(0xF5, 0xDE, 0xB3),
157        White(0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF),
158        WhiteSmoke(0xF5, 0xF5, 0xF5),
159        Yellow(0xFF, 0xFF, 0x00),
160        YellowGreen(0x9A, 0xCD, 0x32);
161        
162        private final int r, g, b;
163
164        CssColor(int r, int g, int b) {
165                this.r = r;
166                this.g = g;
167                this.b = b;
168        }
169        
170        @Override
171        public Color getColor() {
172                return new Color(r, g, b);
173        }
174
175
176//      public String getRGBString() {
177//              /*
178//               * toHexString will return "0" instead of "00" String.format will not
179//               * 0-pad Strings or Hex Have to do it manually...
180//               */
181//              return String.format("#%s%s%s",
182//                              (r < 0x10 ? "0" : "") + Integer.toHexString(r), (g < 0x10 ? "0"
183//                                              : "") + Integer.toHexString(g), (b < 0x10 ? "0" : "")
184//                                              + Integer.toHexString(b));
185//      }
186        
187
188        public static Color[] getColors(CssColor... selectColors) {
189                Color[] rgbColors = new Color[selectColors.length];
190                for (int i = 0; i < selectColors.length; i++) {
191                        rgbColors[i] = selectColors[i].getColor();
192                }
193                return rgbColors;
194        }
195        
196        public static final Color[] SelectColors =
197                        getColors(
198                                        MediumBlue,
199                                        Crimson,
200                                        MediumSeaGreen,
201                                        BlueViolet,
202                                        Tomato,
203                                        CornFlowerBlue,
204                                        DeepPink,
205                                        YellowGreen,
206                                        Magenta,
207                                        //OliveDrab,
208                                        DarkCyan
209                                        );
210
211}
